QuestData.Title: Panther Mastery
QuestData.Description: You've almost proven yourself to be a master hunter of panthers. Yet there is one panther which has eluded your grasp.$b$bSongs are sung about a mighty panther by the name of Bhag'thera. You will see if you can use your skills to kill the great beast.$b$bBringing the Fang of Bhag'thera to Erlgadin should be proof enough that you are a master panther hunter.
QuestData.CompletionText: You're still alive! Excellent! How fares the hunt?
QuestData.RewardText: So the great Bhag'thera is dead! Cheers to you, $n. You are a mighty $c indeed!
